oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mama's Aunt Jen, Catharine Mirick, and les deux chats drawing
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Miles, Emma Bell, 1879-1919
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tone drawing of infant girl, a woman and two cats. Catharine and Aunt Jen are both relatives of Emma Bell Miles on her mother's family.
